message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond this price point. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a budget in mind and I'm trying to stay within it.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $20,000 is already a significant reduction from my initial asking price.  Could you meet me halfway at $15,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $12,000, but I think that's as high as I can go. Can you consider that?
